cop out.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to not do something that someone thinks you should do
cop out.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: As far as I’m concerned, she’s copped out and joined the rat race.
cop out.translation[1].definitions[0].de: something you do or say in order to avoid doing or accepting something
cop out.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Ignoring the problem is a cop-out.
